sunlit_cobblemon.gachamon_capsule.shiny_: %s found a shiny %s from their Gachamon Capsule!
sunlit_cobblemon.gachamon_capsule.scope: You need a Silph Scope to open this...
sunlit_cobblemon.gachamon_capsule.addict: Woah there you Gachamon addict! Defeat some nearby mons before opening more!
tooltip.sunlit_cobblemon.gachamon_capsul: Spawns a random Pokémon from a preset pool alongside a bonus pool
tooltip.sunlit_cobblemon.cobblemon.speci: Changes the ability of the Pokémon it is used on to their alternative standard ability
Changes the ability of the Pokémon it is used on to their alternative hidden ability
tooltip.sunlit_cobblemon.cobblemon.mulch: Increases the growth rate of the Berry Tree that it is used on for 3 harvests.
Increases the yield of the harvest of the Berry Tree that it is used on for 3 harvests.

Increases the chances for a mutation of a Berry on the Berry Tree for 3 harvests.
It can also mutate a fully grown Revival Herb into a Mental Herb, Power Herb, White Herb, or Mirror Herb.
Makes the Berry Tree act like it's in a Plains biome for an infinite duration.
Makes the Berry Tree act like it's in a Mountains or Taiga biome for an infinite duration.
Makes the Berry Tree act like it's in a Forest biome for an infinite duration.
Makes the Berry Tree act like it's in a Jungle or Swamp biome for an infinite duration.
Makes the Berry Tree act like it's in an Arid biome for an infinite duration.

Temporarily raises the target's Defense stat by one stage when used in battle
Temporarily raises the target's Accuracy stat by one stage when used in battle
Temporarily raises the target's Speed stat by one stage when used in battle

Temporarily raises the target's Sp. Atk stat by one stage when used in battle
Temporarily boosts a Pokémon's critical hit ratio when used in battle
Temporarily prevents stat reduction when used in battle

Increases a Pokémon's experience by 10000 Exp. Points
Increases a Pokémon's experience by 30000 Exp. Points

tooltip.sunlit_cobblemon.cobblemon.medic: Revives a fainted Pokémon to 25% of their max HP whilst reducing Friendship
Boosts the amount of HP the holder recovers from HP-stealing moves
Restores 80 HP of a Pokémon whilst reducing friendship
Fully heals any status problems of a Pokémon
Cures a Pokémon from poison
Awakens a Pokémon from sleep
Cures a Pokémon from a burn
Thaws a Pokémon from frozen
Cures a Pokémon from paralysis
Restores 10 PP to one of a Pokémon's selected moves
Fully restores all PP to one of a Pokémon's selected moves
Restores 10 PP to all of a Pokémon's moves
Fully restores all PP to all of a Pokémon's moves
Restores 20 HP when a Pokémon holding the item falls below 50% HP
Restores 20 HP of a Pokémon whilst slightly reducing Friendship
Restores 60 HP of a Pokémon whilst slightly reducing Friendship
Restores 120 HP of a Pokémon whilst slightly reducing Friendship
Cures a Pokémon of all status conditions whilst slightly reducing friendship
Restores 20 HP of a Pokémon
Restores 60 HP of a Pokémon
Restores 120 HP of a Pokémon
Fully restores the HP of a Pokémon
Revives a fainted Pokémon to 50% of their max HP
Revives and fully heals a fainted Pokémon
Fully restores the HP and heals any status problems of a Pokémon
Adds 10 Special Attack EVs to the target Pokémon
Adds 10 Speed EVs to the target Pokémon
Adds 10 HP EVs to the target Pokémon
Adds 10 Defense EVs to the target Pokémon
Adds 10 Attack EVs to the target Pokémon
Adds 10 Special Defense EVs to the target Pokémon
Raises the PP of a selected move by 20% of the move's base PP
Raises the PP of a selected move to 160% of the move's base PP
tooltip.sunlit_cobblemon.cobblemon.evo_i: Evolves Antique Form Sinistea into Antique Form Polteageist
Evolves Phony Form Sinistea into Phony Form Polteageist
Evolves Galarian Slowpoke into Galarian Slowbro
Evolves Galarian Slowpoke into Galarian Slowking
Evolves Poliwhirl into Politoed and Slowpoke into Slowking
Evolves Pokémon that evolve via trading
Evolves Artisan Form Poltchageist into Masterpiece Form Sinistcha
Evolves Scyther into Scizor and Onix into Steelix
Evolves Kubfu into Single Strike Style Urshifu
Evolves Kubfu into Rapid Strike Style Urshifu
Evolves Counterfeit Form Poltchageist into Unremarkable Form Sinistcha
Prevents the holder's ability from being changed or suppressed.
Raises the holder's Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by a damaging Water-type move.
Prevents the holder from being hit by Ground-type moves. Breaks if hit by another type of damaging move.
Raises the holder's Special Defense but prevents the use of status moves.
Boosts the amount of HP the holder recovers from HP-stealing moves.
Increases damage inflicted by the holder's binding moves in between turns from 1/8 to 1/6 of target's HP.
If the holder is a Poison type, its HP is gradually restored throughout a battle. It damages any other type.
Increases the holder's Speed by 2 stages if the holder's move misses.
Reduces the accuracy of enemy Pokémon's moves by 10%.
Raises the holder's Attack by one stage when hit by a damaging Electric-type move.
Boosts the holder's Attack but only allows the use of one move.
Boosts the holder's Speed but only allows the use of one move.
Boosts the holder's Special Attack but only allows the use of one move.
Has no effect.
Protects the holder from additional effects from other Pokémon.
Extends the duration of rain from 5 to 8 turns.
Boosts Clamperl's Special Defense stat.
Boosts Clamperl's Special Attack stat.
Infatuates the opponent when the holder becomes infatuated.
Holder immediately switches out if struck by a damaging move.
Switches out the holder if any stats are lowered. Consumed after use.
Prevents the holder from evolving.
Holder's Defense and Special Defense is boosted by 50% if they are still able to evolve.
Boosts the damage of the holder's super effective moves by 20%.
Allows the holder to receive a share of experience from battles without participating.
Burns the holder.
Halves the holder's weight.
Provides a chance for the holder to survive a potential KO attack, leaving it with 1 HP.
At full HP, guarantees the holder survives a hit that would KO it, leaving it with 1 HP.
Extends the duration of harsh sunlight from 5 to 8 turns.
Prevents the effects of traps set on the battlefield.
Extends the duration of hail or snow from 5 to 8 turns.
Reduces the holder's Speed by 50% and grounds the holder.
When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.
Gradually restores the holder's HP throughout a battle.
Boosts the power of the holder's moves, but causes recoil damage.
Doubles the Attack and Special Attack of Pikachu when held.
Protective moves like Light Screen and Reflect will be effective longer.
The holder's multi-strike moves will hit at least 4 times.
Increases the amount of experience earned by the holder in battle.
Boosts the critical hit ratio of a Farfetch'd or Sirfetch'd that holds it by two stages.
Grounds the holder, and halves their speed.
Raises and untransformed Ditto's Defense and Special Defense by 50%.
Boosts the power of moves used consecutively.
Allows the holder to mirror an opponent's stat increases to boost its own stats. Consumed after use.
Boosts the power of the holder's physical moves.
Allows the holder to immediately use a move that normally requires a change of turn to charge. Consumed after use.
Protects the holder from contact effects from the target.
Boosts the power of the holder's punching moves and prevents them from triggering contact with the target.
Grants the holder a chance of going first.
Doubles an untransformed Ditto's speed.
Boosts the critical-hit ratio of the holder's moves.
When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.
When holder is struck by a damaging move, forces the attacker that used the move to switch out.
The holder's type immunities are removed.
Causes a Pokémon that makes direct contact with the holder to take damage.
Lowers the holder's Speed when Trick Room is in effect. Consumed after use.
Grants the holder immunity to powder and spore moves and damage from weather.
Boosts the holder's critical hit ratio.
Allows the holder to switch out in any situation.
Restores 1/8 HP to holder based on damage dealt by moves to opponents.
Has no effect.
Extends the duration of sandstorms from 5 to 8 turns.
No battle effect. Increases the holder's friendship earned by 50%.
The holder loses 1/8 of max HP per turn. Transfers to other Pokémon on contact.
Lengthens the duration of moves and Abilities that alter the terrain of the battlefield.
Raises the holder's Special Attack when using a sound-based move.
Poisons the holder.
The holder is unaffected by Rain or Harsh Sunlight.
Raises the holder's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages when holder is hit by a super effective move.
Restores any lower stat in battle. Consumed after use.
